description:
At Hyakkao Private Academy, Yumeko Jabami’s star rises just as the student council’s reputation starts to dim. In the shadows of the council’s dwindling power, discord reigns supreme. In a bold effort to rebalance the social scales, student council president Kirari Momobami intends to place her bet on the election for the council’s next president. Everyone starts with a single chip, and at the end of 30 days, the whoever holds the most becomes the president of the Momobami Clan. But chips aren’t the only things students can wager as they fight tooth and nail to ascend to the council presidency, and Yumeko Jabami intends to clean house no matter the prizes she must risk in the betting pool.

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)
synonyms: โคตรเซียนโรงเรียนพนัน  ภาค 2

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

tags.name: Yuri
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two females, not inherently sexual. Also known as Girls' Love.

tags.name: Villainess
tags.description: Centers around or prominently features a villainous noble lady.

tags.name: Death Game
tags.description: Features characters participating in a game, where failure results in death.

tags.name: Slavery

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Ojou-sama
tags.description: Features a wealthy, high-class, oftentimes stuck up and demanding female character.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: School Club

tags.name: Gender Bending
tags.description: Prominently features a character who dresses and behaves in a way characteristic of another gender, or has been transformed into a person of another gender.

tags.description: The act or an instance of taking or attempting to take one's own life voluntarily and intentionally.

node.description: [Personal Website](http://2st.jp/500/) | [Website (Kawamoto Muno Studio)](https://kawamuno.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ushimilksan) Homura Kawamoto is a Japanese manga artist. Together with [Hikaru Muno](https://anilist.co/staff/128746/) they make up the studio Kawamoto Muno Studio.
The artist for the *Kakegurui* manga series.

[Website](http://junnarockyou.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/junnarockyou/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/junnarockyou/) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@junna_rockyou?) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnqOw96NU-jDDcFkEXGmnTg) | [Artist Profile](https://www.jvcmusic.co.jp/flyingdog/-/Artist/A025763.html)

Junna Saka, better known as JUNNA is a Japanese pop singer managed by Cube Inc. and signed to FlyingDog.

JUNNA's hobbies include watching YouTube videos. Her favorite food is (dried foods) snacks.

JUNNA is a member of the real-life idol group, [Walküre](https://anilist.co/staff/226500/Walkre)

Hiroo Maruyama is a producer working for Mainichi Broadcasting System (MBS).

He joined Mainichi Broadcasting in 1999. Was transferred later to the Tokyo office and took over duties relating to the production of animation broadcasts. He was responsible for production on series like Gundam Seed, Gundam Seed Destiny and Full Metal Alchemist, all part of the 6:00pm Saturday timeblock, which gained wide popularity.

He started his career at Studio Live working on outsourced episodes for a few years. His first major role was as mechanical designer on the short series [The Cosmopolitan Prayers](https://anilist.co/anime/112/).

After leaving Studio Live he was involved in several [Studio 4°C](https://anilist.co/studio/13/) and [MADHOUSE](https://anilist.co/studio/11/) projects, with the former studio housing his debut as director on the short TOYOTA commercial series [PES: Peace Eco Smiles](https://anilist.co/anime/13427/).

He's been affiliated with Studio [MAPPA](https://anilist.co/studio/569/) since 2014 where he helmed his first TV Series, [Garo: The Animation](https://anilist.co/anime/20753/), and several other anime.

**Notable works outside anime:**

- Persona 5: Royal (Video Game, 2019) (OP Director, OP Storyboard, OP Key Animation)
She was nicknamed "Yasuko Nyan" by her godfather Naomi Takebe, a producer at [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/Toei-Animation).
Executive Officer and Head of the 3DCG Department at [MAPPA](https://anilist.co/studio/569/).
